DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effect of transabdominal ultrasound guided embryo transfer on the pregnancy rates versus clinical touch technique
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Ultrasound Guided Embryo Transfer on Pregnancy Rates
DOC.detailed_description: A total of 90 patients undergoing treatment with ICSI were divided into 2 groups: group 1 (45 patients), had ultrasound guided embryo transfer and group 2 (45 patients), underwent embryo transfer using the clinical touch technique
DOC.criteria: Age (2039) Male factor infertility Ovarian factor infertility Unexplained infertility Tubal factor infertility Endometriosis FSH > 16 iu/l on cycle day 3 Less than 2 embryos grade A Difficult embryo transfer
DOC.keyword: Embryo transfer, transabdominal ultrasound, IVF, ICSI
